maplist



class MapList;
Holds a list of map lump markers and how many lumps they contain. It is used to marge multiple maps from WAD files together. Aside from Doom map types, Hexen and UDMF maps are supported.

void readFrom(WAD wad);
Adds map markers from a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to add map markers from.

void addTo(WAD wad);
Adds the maps in this list and their lumps to a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to add the lumps to.

void sort();
Sorts this list's map markers by name.
